name: Phaseolus

Heart: Fearful palpitation and feeling that death is approaching
Head: Aches chiefly in forehead or orbits from fullness of brain; worse any movement or mental exertion
Chest: Dropsical effusion into pleura or pericardium
Sick feeling about heart, with weak pulse

dosage: Sixth and higher. A decoction of the shells as a drink for diabetes, but look out for severe headache.
